programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Non-binary performance artist Susan Williams adores theatre. Their latest show, Illegally Blind, is based on their experience living with Visual Snow Syndrome - a rare form of blindness.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
(S18EP13) Over 6 feet tall at just 13 years old, Milly manages the rare condition Marfan Syndrome, while grieving the loss of her mum to bowel cancer.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP11) Murdoch investigates a rash of tunnelling robberies that Crabtree is convinced were perpetrated by a species of mole people.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP34) On this episode of Double Tap TV, we're joined by Celine Lee from Amazon to discuss the company's groundbreaking collaboration with Cochlear to enhance the TV viewing experience for people with hearing implants.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP01) This episode of Disrupt spotlights the talent and creativity of a musician, a poet, a comedian, a filmmaker and a choir of performers who are Deaf.
Année : 2023

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S02EP04) Abigail accepts Bill's help when she goes to Hamilton and becomes a guest of Elizabeth's family. Jack's courageous actions lead him to bond with Rosemary. Elizabeth and Jack ponder the future after she returns to town.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary "Rosie" LeVeaux) Kavan Smith (Leland "Lee" Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Chelah Horsdal (Cat Montgomery) Mitchell Kummen (Gabe Montgomery) Gracyn Shinyei (Emily Montgomery) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: By Hook or By Cook
programme.desc:
(S01EP08) Karen's love for the outdoors and desire to feel the rush of excitement is taking her on a jetboat adventure up in northern B.C.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S03EP10) Things get a little nutty as Chef Luke Hayes-Alexander joins Christine and Carl in the kitchen.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
Trailblazers Tandem Cycling Club offers recreational cycling to people who are blind or partially sighted through rides with sighted volunteers.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP09) Fashion designers Robbie and Cindy bring an antique sewing machine into the workshop, which Chris and Alex help turn into a desk with a lamp. Then, Alex and Chris get their hands dirty in a pottery lesson.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S05EP09) After a ruthless inventor is killed at a convention, Murdoch's investigation is assisted by his idol, Alexander Graham Bell.
Année : 2008

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
We get the ball rolling with Amy Burk, Canada's most prolific scorer in Women's Goalball. Then, we hit the ground running with Alex Bobbie Mason, an athlete using sport to better lives in his community.
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S04EP07) In this episode: Representation matters. Injured as a teenager, a young woman doesn't realize her own potential until she meets other wheelchair users in university.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:

programme.desc:

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:

Année : 2014

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S02EP01) Emilee is done with her girl-next-door look. But as someone who is partially sighted, she's unsure about navigating fashion and beauty on her own. She wants tips, tricks and hacks on how to put together a professional, polished look independently.
Année : 2022
